channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Factor Strategies Belong in Your Completion Portfolio Toolkit
item.description: Why wouldn't you include factor strategies in your completion portfolio? A review of the two commonly used approaches for managing institutional assets highlights their symbiotic nature.

item.title: Elon Musk predicts jobs will become ‘kinda like a hobby’
item.description: "In a benign scenario probably none of us will have a job."

item.title: For the Analyst: Peer Benchmarking Methods to Improve Earnings Forecasts
item.description: Peer benchmarking is a vexing task for financial analysts but one that is critical for forecasting earnings. This straightforward measure can help find peers for relative performance, compensation, and valuation benchmarking.

item.title: ‘A glaring blind spot’ in housing affordability: Mortgage underwriting and home appraisals should account for energy costs. Here’s why
item.description: Ensuring home affordability is crucial to protecting the American Dream, but the monthly mortgage payment is just one part of the cost of owning a home.

item.title: Building LLMs in the Open-Source Community: A Call to Action for Investment Professionals
item.description: Large language models like ChatGPT are changing the way we think about investing and reshaping roles in the investment profession.

item.title: Fake AI-generated Biden robocalls orchestrator faces $6m fine and criminal charges
item.description: The Federal Communications Commission said the fine it proposed for Steven Kramer is its first involving generative AI technology.

item.title: Sustainability Reporting: Navigating Assurance Practices
item.description: Don't be lulled into a false sense of security by the word "assurance" when evaluating sustainability reports. Assurance practices vary, and investors would be wise to learn more about the different levels of coverage.

item.title: Tiny Scottish island, with more sheep than people, becomes the U.K.'s first spaceport for vertical rockets
item.description: Former military site, SaxaVord, is one of seven spaceports being built around the U.K. in the wake of new laws encouraging private investment in the space industry.

item.title: The Power of Clicks, Likes, and Shares: Promote the Right Kind of Financial Content
item.description: Not all financial content creators on social media are created equal. A broad differentiation can be made between influencers, knowledge sharers, and aspiring thought leaders.

item.title: Louisiana legislature approves bill that would punish the possession of abortion pills without a prescription with hefty fines and jail time
item.description: Two abortion-inducing drugs could soon be reclassified as controlled and dangerous substances in Louisiana under a first-of-its-kind bill that received final legislative passage Thursday.
